subject: Re: [junit] Accessing private variables.
msgSnippet: have a setter and getter methods. Without that, one cannot access the private variables anyway. Dhar ... From: rons h  To:
messageBody:
have a setter and getter methods. Without that, one cannot access the
private variables anyway.

Dhar
